ability.mineminenomi.10_000_kilo_press.d: Makes the user become extremely heavy, crashing down on enemies from above crushes them, damage is calculated based on the fall distance.

ability.mineminenomi.command.description: Sends a command to all nearby entities that the player has control over.
§aIDLE§r removes any previously issued command from all nearby entities
§aATTACK§r either start attacking the entity the player is looking at (if any) or the closest one
§aFOLLOW§r will start following the command sender
§aSTAY§r will stay in place, attacking only after being hit first
§aGUARD§r wil attack any nearby enemies but then return back to its guarding point

ability.mineminenomi.virus_zone.descript: Throws a lingering splash potion of the mummy virus or ice oni virus.
ability.mineminenomi.volt_amaru.descript: Transforms the user into a powerful, lightning giant massively boosting physical attributes and lightning attacks
ability.mineminenomi.vulcanization.descr: Coats the user into a thick stone-like layer that increases the armor of its user.
ability.mineminenomi.warabide_sword.desc: Creates a sword that can shoot long thin straw-like projectiles.
ability.mineminenomi.weapon_spin.descrip: Spins around hitting all nearby enemies with the held weapon.
ability.mineminenomi.weapon_throw.descri: Throws the held weapon dealing damage based on the weapon's damage.
ability.mineminenomi.weather_cloud_tempo: Creates a cloud that can further be used by other Tempos
ability.mineminenomi.weather_egg.descrip: Instantly creates a Weather Cloud as if combining a Cool Ball and a Heat Ball
ability.mineminenomi.white_blow.descript: Shoots a cloud of smoke to engulf the opponent and trap them
ability.mineminenomi.white_blow_rush.des: Shoots clouds of smoke to engulf the opponent and trap them
ability.mineminenomi.white_launcher.desc: Transforms the user into smoke and launches them forward
ability.mineminenomi.white_out.descripti: Fires both fists at an enemy and lifts them up, moving them around according to the user's movements
ability.mineminenomi.white_pull.descript: Pulls all nearby entities surrounded by smoke towards the user.
ability.mineminenomi.white_snake.descrip: Launches a long dense cloud of smoke in the shape of a snake that will damage and give poison to its target
ability.mineminenomi.white_strike.descri: Surrounds the nearby area with smoke, slowing down nearby entities
Shoots a net from one of the many guns hidden within the armor.
ability.mineminenomi.yakkodori.descripti: Launches a crescent moon-shaped slash, which destroys everything in its path
ability.mineminenomi.yarinami.descriptio: The user fires a densely compressed spear-shaped waterbullet at the opponent
ability.mineminenomi.yasakani_no_magatam: Fires a torrent of deadly light particles, causing huge destruction
ability.mineminenomi.yata_no_kagami.desc: The user forms light between his hands, and reflects it off any surface he wishes, instantly teleporting it towards where the light hit.
ability.mineminenomi.yomi_no_reiki.descr: The user's spirit leaves their body, allowing them to freely explore the nearby areas.
ability.mineminenomi.yuki_gaki.descripti: Creates a wall made of hardened snow to protect the user.
ability.mineminenomi.yuki_rabi.descripti: Launches numerous hardened snowballs, shaped like a rabbit's head, that can inflict %s on their enemies.
ability.mineminenomi.yutai_ridatsu.descr: The user's spirit leaves their body, allowing them to freely explore the nearby areas.
ability.mineminenomi.zenshin_kibaku.desc: The user creates a massive explosion from their body
ability.mineminenomi.zoom.description.0: Zooms into the direction the user is looking, massively reduces inaccuracy when shooting projectiles.
ability.mineminenomi.zou_guard_point.des: Transforms the user into an elephant, which focuses on defense.
ability.mineminenomi.zou_heavy_point.des: Transforms the user into an elephant hybrid, which focuses on strength.
ability.mineminenomi.zou_rideable.descri: Allows other players to ride on your back.

gui.mineminenomi.config.option.haoshoku_:
Responsible for how a player's Haoshoku Haki outline will be colored; 
 STANDARD - Standard red outline 
 CUSTOM - Allows the player to customize it using their own client config 
 RANDOM - Assignes a random color for each player based on their account's UUID
Default: STANDARD

Responsible for how player unlock Haoshoku Haki; 
 NONE - Haoshoku Haki cannot be unlocked naturally 
 RANDOM - Only a few chosen ones receive it when they spawn 
 EXPERIENCE - Will unlock based on the total amount of Haki experience a player has
 COMBINED - Combiens the logic of RANDOM and EXPERIENCE
 TRUE_RANDOM - Each world / server has its own pool of randomly chosen Haoshoku Haki users
Default: COMBINED

 NONE - nothing is kept 
 AUTO - only the faction/race/fighting style stats are kept 
 FULL - everything is kept 
 CUSTOM - will use the 'Stats to Keep' section to determine which stats to keep
Default: AUTO

gui.mineminenomi.config.option.one_fruit:
Restricts the Devil Fruit spawns to only 1 of each type per world; 
 NONE - No logic is applied, an infinite number of each fruit can exist 
 SIMPLE - No more than one fruit type can be acquired via natural means (chests, leaves, fruit reincarnations etc) 
 EXTENDED - Extra rules are applied on top of the SIMPLE set that blocks any means (or as many as possible) of storing/hoarding fruits 
Default: NONE
